Key Match Events: Ángel Di María scored the winning goal for Argentina in the 11th minute of the match.
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi watched Di Maria's goal from the bench before replacing him in the 56th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Ángel Di María said, 'It was a deserved win. We have to keep working as we always do and stay as united,' after the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina take on Guatemala in another friendly on Friday before the defending champions kick off their Copa America campaign against Canada on June 20.
